This guide is a simplified overview of '''all non-experimental changes''' in [[Trails & Tales]] update ({{BE}} 1.20.0 to ''Bedrock Edition'' 1.20.41), which assumes at least some familiarity with [[The Wild Update]] (''Bedrock Edition'' 1.19.x releases), excluding experimental features in these versions.

== Mobs ==
=== New ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}}
|-
| [[Camel]]
| [[File:Camel Walk.gif|128px]]
| Spawn in desert [[village]]s
| 
* {{xp|1|3}} (when killed by a [[player]] or tamed [[wolf]])
|
* The first mob on which two people can ride at the same time
* Can be fed with cacti
|-
| [[Sniffer]]
| [[File:Sniffer walk.gif|128px]]
|
* Does not spawn naturally
* Spawned by hatching Sniffer Eggs
| 
* {{xp|1|3}} (when killed by a [[player]] or tamed [[wolf]])
|
* Mob with the most votes in the first round on Mob Vote
* Their babies are called Snifflets
|}

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}}
|-
| [[Horse]], [[mule]], and<br> [[donkey]]
| {{animate|White_Horse.png;Mule.png;Donkey.png|128px}}
| Can now be tempted using a [[golden apple]], [[golden carrot]], or [[enchanted golden apple]].

| [[File:Magma_Cube_JE2_BE2.png|128px]]

| [[File:Hoglin_BE2.png|128px]]

| [[File:Husk_JE2_BE2.png|128px]]
| Now plays a sound when converting to a [[drowned]].
|-

| [[File:Pig_JE3_BE2.png|128px]]
| Now emit sounds when transformed into [[zombified piglin]].

|-
| [[Villager]]
| [[File:Plains Villager Base JE2.png|128px]]
|
* The discount for curing a villager is no longer multiplied if the villager is reinfected and cured again.
* When killed they no longer drop items held in their hands.
* [[Cartographer]]s no longer offer exploration maps as a trade item when not in the overworld.
|-
| [[Wandering trader]]
| [[File:Wandering Trader.png|128px]]
| Now can sell 1 [[cherry sapling]] for 5 emeralds.
|-
| [[Witch]]
| [[File:Witch_BE.png|128px]]
|
* Now throws [[Healing]] and [[Regeneration]] [[potion]]s at raiders during village [[raid]]s.
* Now target [[player]]s within a 16 block distance.
|-
| [[Zombie villager]]
| [[File:Plains_Zombie_Villager_Base.png|128px]]
|
* Now displays their rank in appearance.
* Curing time is now randomized between 3 and 5 minutes, to match {{JE}}.
|-
| [[Cat]]
| {{animate|Tabby_Cat.png;Tuxedo_Cat_JE2_BE2.png;Red_Cat.png;Siamese_Cat_JE3.png;British_Shorthair_Cat.png;Calico_Cat.png;Persian_Cat.png;Ragdoll_Cat.png;White_Cat.png;Jellie_Cat.png;Black_Cat.png|128px}}
| Now plays a sound when begging for food.
|-
| [[Guardian]] and <br> [[elder guardian]]
| [[File:Guardian.gif|128px]] <br> [[File:Elder_Guardian.gif|128px]]
| Makes flopping sounds again when on land.
|-
| [[Iron golem]] and <br> [[snow golem]]
| [[File:Iron_Golem_JE2_BE2.png|128px]] <br> [[File:Snow_Golem.png|128px]]
| Now have a crumbling-like [[particle]] effect when they are created.
|-
| [[Wither]]
| [[File:Wither_JE2_BE2.png|128px]]
| The [[boss bar]] on the HUD is now same color as {{JE}}.
|-
| [[Wither skeleton]]
| [[File:Wither_Skeleton_JE4_BE3.png|128px]]
| Now have their own unique [[sound]]s.

=== Changed ===
{|{{Simple Guide table|Changed Blocks}}
|-
| [[Note block]]
| [[File:Note Block.png|84px]]
|
* When a mob head is placed on it, it now makes ambient sound of that mob.
* Now produces the "harp" sound instead of "snare" using [[soul soil]].
* Updated the sound that’s played when [[wither skeleton]] [[skull]]s are placed on top.
|-
| [[Sign]]
| {{Animate|Oak Sign.png;Spruce Sign.png;Birch Sign.png;Jungle Sign.png;Acacia Sign.png;Dark Oak Sign.png;Mangrove Sign.png;Crimson Sign.png;Warped Sign.png;Cherry Sign.png|84px}}{{Animate|Oak Wall Sign.png;Spruce Wall Sign.png;Birch Wall Sign.png;Jungle Wall Sign.png;Acacia Wall Sign.png;Dark Oak Wall Sign.png;Mangrove Wall Sign.png;Crimson Wall Sign.png;Warped Wall Sign.png;Cherry Wall Sign.png|84px}}
|
* Can now be edited without breaking.
* Now can write on both sides.
* Can now be waxed with honeycomb.
|-
| [[Sculk sensor]]
| [[File:Sculk Sensor.gif|84px]]
|
* Most of vibration frequencies simplified.
* Can now detect some events.
* Can now detect closing the inventory of a [[boat with chest]], a [[Boat with Chest|bamboo raft with chest]], or a [[minecart with chest]].
|-
| [[Smithing table]]
| [[File:Smithing Table.png|84px]]
| GUI reworked to include Smithing templates.
|-
| [[Barrel]]
| [[File:Barrel_(U)_JE1_BE1.png|84px]]
| Recipe now use [[planks]] instead of [[stick]]s to match {{JE}}.
|-
| [[Packed mud]]
| [[File:Packed_Mud_JE1_BE1.png|84px]]
| Can no longer mine faster with a [[shovel]].
|-
| [[Pumpkin]]
| [[File:Carved_Pumpkin_(N)_JE5.png|84px]]
| Using [[shear]]s on it now produces a carving sound to match {{JE}}.
|-
| [[Snow]]
| [[File:Snow_(layers_1)_JE3_BE3.png|84px]]
| Now different layers of snow have different heights to match {{JE}}.
|-
| [[Sculk]]
| [[File:Sculk_JE1_BE1.gif|84px]]
| No longer drops [[XP]] when mined with [[Silk Touch]].
|-
| [[Calibrated sculk sensor]]
| [[File:Calibrated_Sculk_Sensor_BE1.gif|84px]]
| Can now detect closing the inventory of a [[boat with chest]], a [[Boat with Chest|bamboo raft with chest]], or a [[minecart with chest]].
|-
| [[Water]]
| [[File:Water_BE_(animated).png|84px]]
|
* [[Mob]]s no longer receive [[fall damage]] when falling into a 1 block deep water pool.
* The ambient sounds for entering exiting water is now played only when an [[entity]] is submerged below eye-level in water, matching {{JE}}.
* The splash sound for entering water has been updated to match {{JE}}.
|}
